item.title: HoloCMS
item.description: Our Goal The main goal of HoloCMS is to create an interactive and user friendly platform that leverages AR for educational and cultural experiences. By combining QR code technology with the Microsoft HoloLens 2, we aim to offer an immersive way for users to discover and explore detailed information intuitively. Features QR Code Scanning: With HoloCMS, users can move through different environments using the Microsoft HoloLens 2 to scan QR codes that activate digital content displays.
